entry.tran: 倒霉的;注定要倒霉的;注定没有好结果的
entry.def: If you describe something as ill-fated, you mean that it ended or will end in an unsuccessful or unfortunate way.

example.ex: England's footballers are back home after their ill-fated trip to Algeria.
example.tran: 英格兰足球队结束了倒霉的阿尔及利亚之行，回到了国内。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
